column.name: status
column.remarks: The code for the status of the report

column.name: processed
column.remarks: The date and time the report was processed

column.name: processing_attempts
column.remarks: The number of times the processing of the report has been attempted

column.name: processing_time
column.remarks: The cumulative processing time, in milliseconds, for the report across all processing attempts

column.name: processing_suspended
column.remarks: Has processing been suspended for the report

column.name: locked
column.remarks: The date and time the report was locked for processing

column.name: lock_name
column.remarks: The name of the entity that has locked the report for processing

column.name: last_processed
column.remarks: The date and time the last attempt was made to process the report

column.name: next_processed
column.remarks: The date and time the next attempt will be made to process the report
